title: Frequently asked questions
description: All you need to know to work with us

1.question: What details are required to register on your site?
1.answer: Please note that our company, when registering, does not require any personal data from you, as well as no bank card number, CVV, expiration date.  It is enough to specify the details or wallet number for deposit and withdrawal of funds in your personal account on the online platform Apate Cyprus Estate.

2.question: Can I start investing if I am under 18?
2.answer: Absolutely everyone can make money in Apate Cyprus Estate.

3.question: Can I create accounts on your online platform for my entire family using one device?
3.answer: No! You are only allowed to create one account per device to avoid suspicion of multi-accounting.

4.question: What is the minimum amount I can withdraw?
4.answer: Minimum withdrawal amount: For cryptocurrencies: 10$ PerfectMoney and other payment systems: 1$

5.question: How long does it take to deposit/withdraw funds?
5.answer: Crediting and withdrawal of funds is carried out within 24 hours from the moment the request is made.

6.question: Can I choose which payment system to withdraw my profit to?
6.answer: Withdrawal of accruals is possible only to the payment system from which the replenishment of the personal account was made.

7.question: What are some ways to make a deposit?
7.answer: You can replenish your personal account with cryptocurrency or one of the available payment systems.

8.question: How to withdraw funds from my personal wallet?
8.answer: Specify the wallet number for withdrawal in the settings of your Apate Cyprus Estate personal account. Then request a withdrawal.

9.question: Can I earn money in Apate Cyprus Estate without my own deposit?
9.answer: In order to start earning in Apate Cyprus, you just need to register a personal account and generate your referral link. You can earn money by inviting affiliates.

10.question: What are some of the ways to generate income at Apate Cyprus Estate?
10.answer: You have the opportunity to earn income in several ways: to open a deposit on the chosen plan, to receive interest on the affiliate program, for attracting new partners, and also, to earn more by advancing and increasing your "rank". For this purpose there is a multi-level affiliate program, with which you can get acquainted on the site.

11.question: Are there limits on the amount of the deposit?
11.answer: If you study our investment platform, you will notice that there is a minimum deposit amount - it is 100 US dollars. The maximum deposit amount is not regulated, there is a plan "Individual", it is discussed with technical support or company representatives.

12.question: How often will I receive interest on my deposits in Apate Cyprus Estate?
12.answer: Interest on deposits is accrued based on the tariff plan you have chosen: daily or at the end of the term. The interest will be accrued exactly 24 hours after the deposit is placed in the system.

13.question: What is the maximum income possible in Apate Cyprus Estate?
13.answer: You can find all investment offers on our website. Also, for your convenience, we have placed an investment calculator, so that by choosing your plan you could calculate your profit in advance. Your profit directly depends on which investment plan you have chosen, how much you have invested and how many partners you have attracted using our affiliate program.

14.question: How do I get started as an investor with Apate Cyprus Estate?
14.answer: Register on our investment platform and create a personal account. After selecting an investment plan, choose a convenient payment method, specify the amount, confirm the transaction, and wait for the funds to be credited to your personal account balance.

15.question: I can't get registered on the site, what should I do?
15.answer: Please check that the data entered is correct. If everything is in order, but you still cannot register, please contact the support team on Telegram or write an email to the company's email address.

16.question: I can't remember my password, how do I log in to my personal account?
16.answer: Contact the support team on Telegram or send an email to the company's email account.

17.question: What if I didn't find the answer to my question here?
17.answer: Contact us via support service in Telegram or by writing an email to the company mail.
